    • Uses of IListener in crazyballrun.game.controls

      Methods in crazyballrun.game.controls with parameters of type IListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IControl.addListener(IListener listener, java.lang.String event)
      Subscribes an event listener to the control.
      void ControlEngine.deregister(IListener listener, java.lang.String control, java.lang.String event)
      De-registers a listener from a control for a particular event.
      void ControlEngine.register(IListener listener, java.lang.String control, java.lang.String event)
      Registers a listener for a particular event of a control.
      void IControl.removeListener(IListener listener, java.lang.String event)
      Removes an event listener from the control.
